Detailed Description

StealAlgorithm on a workset

This is the base class for stealing over a workset. By default, no instance of this class is attached to the workset, and a workset could not be stolen (invocation to steal always return false).

It is to the responsability of the upper level to reify steal algorithm for a workset in order to capture invocation for remote steal operation.

See also:
WS module
